metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1032 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Linux kernel io_uring IORING_OP_SOCKET double free Thadeu Cascardo discovered that the io_uring subsystem contained a double- free vulnerability in certain memory allocation error conditions. A local attacker could possibly use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.19.0-40.41
linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-40.41
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.19.0-40.41
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic-64k - 5.19.0-40.41
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-1015-allwinner - 5.19.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1028-aws - 5.19.0-1023.24
